website_summaries.verdict: One of the highest-selling mattress covers recognized for its impressive airflow technology.
pros: Customers rave over the completely waterproof design
Airflow technology allows for a breathable protector with a helpful cooling system
cons: A few customers wish the material was softer

website_summaries.verdict: Go for this one if you don't mind your bed being a little extra snug.
pros: Solid combination of versatile size and hypoallergenic and waterproof material
cons: May trap heat, especially in warmer climates

customer_reviews.title: Accidental spills
customer_reviews.text: The night I received my brand new mattress I threw this mattress protector on right away. I FINALLY had a brand new mattress! Two hours later my girlfriend spilled her ice tea... No worries I thought! The selling point of this mattress protector for me was, “accidental spills.” Well. Not so much. The liquid went right through and onto my mattress. The protector acted as more of an additional sheet than a shield. Maybe it does it’s job for dust mites and such, but not for spills.
customer_reviews.author: Be Ck

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Protection for Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mattress protector for awhile now, but have only recently had an opportunity to test how well it really protects. I already knew that it fit my deep mattress perfectly and made no noise whatsoever when slept upon. So far, so good. Then, just the other night, my little dog had an accident while on the bed. The "liquid" seeped through the bedspread, blanket, and two sheets . . but NOT through the mattress protector. Hurrah! So now I can honestly say that this mattress is everything that the seller claims it is. I couldn't be happier with it!
customer_reviews.author: Marilee L.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!! Very protective!
customer_reviews.text: My son has has two bed wetting accidents and a bloody nose since we purchased this protector and have had none of them leak to the mattress. It has held up just fine being washed and dryed on regular.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin L

customer_reviews.title: It's 7 years old, frequently machine washed (and dried), and still in great condition
customer_reviews.text: This thing has saved me many times from having to scrub mattresses in the middle of the night when the kids have accidents. I have one of these for each kid's bed. They TOTALLY block accidents. They are machine washable and I machine dry too. The one I have on my oldest kid's bed is 7 years old and in perfect condition. I wash it 1-2 times a month. It is large enough to fit a thick mattress cover underneath (like one of those down-filled ones). The only problem is they can trap heat and get a little warm. So I put a thick mattress pad on top of it and it seems to allow some air to circulate.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Not for Chemically sensistive
customer_reviews.text: Strong smell of some toxic rubber or plastic. Before I ordered it I emailed the company to ask them what it was made of. They ignored me. That was a red flag. I took the chance and ordered . This product may save you from dust mites. They probably would all die from the chemical outgassing. However, if you thrive with the 'new car smell' it will probably work for you.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bollinger

customer_reviews.title: Holds water and then absorbs like a towel
customer_reviews.text: I tried this under a faucet to see how it works. I made a pocket with my hand and filled it with water and I was able to make a pool so that none of the water leaked out (photo below). The water was gradually absorbed into the top layer, which has a soft cotton material like a fine soft towel, and then the pool of water eventually disappeared as it was absorbed. The bottom stayed completely dry. So this mattress protector provides both a water barrier underneath, plus an absorbent layer on top to help soak up and spread the spill.
customer_reviews.author: D. Coral

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, soft and not bulky - perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this pad is not bulky. It is super soft and practically undetectable when you lie on it. Though I haven't tested the effectiveness of the waterproof barrier or washed it yet, it feels like the backing material the same as diaper or reuseable pads are lined with - perfect. It didn't make me feel hot or sweaty. So far I love it! I'll update my review if it changes after washing it or a spill.
customer_reviews.author: 24HrMommy

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Soft... and Effective. No plastic feel.
customer_reviews.text: At first I couldn't visualize ever needing this cover. Two weeks after install, I accidentally dropped the reservoir from my CPAP machine and spilled a substantial amount of water on the bed. Holding my breath, I soaked it up into a couple towels and peeled the sheets back... not a drop penetrated this cover. BUT....."You'll probably never need it" 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Watza Matta U?

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable waterproof mattress protector
customer_reviews.text: I love these mattress protectors. They are soft and washable. There is no plastic feel when they are on the bed. On several occasions, something was spilled on the mattress and this protector did the job - there was no evidence that anything went through the protector, onto the mattress. They seem to last for about 6 ot 7 years. I don't see that as a problem - most things aren't permanent, and if it was more durable it would probably feel like plastic underneath me on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Crager

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA, excellent product, great fit.
customer_reviews.text: I already had one of these mattress covers and have been very happy with it. I especially like the excellent construction and full fit on the mattress. No tugging to try to get it to fit. There is lots of skirt for thicker mattresses. The waterproofing is excellent and not hot to sleep on or crinkly. Easy to launder, as well. I particularly like that it was made in the USA and gladly pay a bit more for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy BarryFenity

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied with our purchase
customer_reviews.text: We needed a mattress protector because we got a new bed. I read many reviews before buying this one. We have little ones who still sleep on our bed sometimes and needed protection from potty accidents. It has held up perfectly! I washed it as instructed and it has protected our mattress twice from potty accidents. I am going to buy another one as a back up because it works so well. I have already told my family about this mattress protector. It’s soft and does not make noise when we go to sleep. Overall, very satisfied with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was very surprised at how light and thin this ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at how light and thin this mattress protector is. The "old-style" ones I have that are proven effective are so much larger, thicker and heavier than this one. I really won't know how well it works until it's tested, of course. The side panels seem so thin, but seem strong, too. I will know in about 10-12 months how well it will stand up to washing and making the bed. If it works as well as my old style ones work, I will be back for another.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: No crinkling sound
customer_reviews.text: It was tough searching for a product that there are so many out there. After reading many reviews on several similar type products, I did notice that the Phelan durability of this mattress cover was very nice. And the reviews We’re right on when they mention there’s no crinkling sound of the mattress cover material. I have had this mattress cover for approximately two weeks now and I am very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it's 100% waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I looked at many reviews of truly 100% waterproof mattress pads. I decided to go with this one as it was mid-range in price. So far, I love it! It really has been completely waterproof. It does fit like a sheet and is fairly thin. No awful plastic noise as it has a nice cotton top. I use it for a teenager with disabilities which include incontinence, so we're talking about it being able to hold larger volumes of liquid. I've washed AND dried it an so far it's held up. I do dry on low heat and remove immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S

customer_reviews.title: BEST. MATTRESS PAD. EVER.
customer_reviews.text: These are THE BEST mattress pads EVER! We have them on all 5 beds in our house and my parents have purchased them for their houses too at my recommendation. They protect the mattress from all accidents! They are thin and don't take away from the comfort of your mattress. They fit in any washing machine and wash up so nicely! The terricloth material on top is somewhat soft and sometimes my kids will just sleep on it if their sheets are done yet in the laundry. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkly. Stretches out.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress protector for 5 years now. It proved to be waterproof (sick cat) and washed well. However, it has never fit correctly, leaving wrinkles across the entire surface and around the sides due to loose elastic. I purchased regular corner clasp attachments to pull it more snugly but those didn't work. The elastic just stretched out more. Then I bought 3-way attachments and still this did not solve the problem. My mattress is 8" thick but I would think it still would be loose on a 12" mattress. I will try another brand and be sure to look at the elastic around the edges before using it.
customer_reviews.author: Waldo

customer_reviews.title: LUNA - A Great Mattress Protector.  This is my 2nd One Purchased.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I've purchased from Luna. We bought a brand new bed last month. I want to protect the mattress as much as possible from everyday use. I love my previous Luna mattress protector and do believe it's helped keep its condition in the past four years. So I bought another one for the new bed. Washable, dry-able, helps to keep the hair/dander/sweat at bay. And Made in America. I would highly recommend above other mainstream brands you see at Macy's or Bed Bath and Beyond.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Brady

customer_reviews.title: King sized mattress cover works
customer_reviews.text: Great product...no noise when you move around...feels like parachute material...tested it as soon as I got it and ran tons of water over it-no wet feeling...thinking about getting more...thank you for such a nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: This is a great mattress protector and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mattress protector and inexpensive. Some of the reviews complained that it made a "crinkle" noise when lying on it. I followed the instructions and washed it prior to use and there are no crinkle noises. No "hot flashes" either; so, it does allow for air circulation. I purchased this because of the price and would recommend it because of the quality in addition to the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: The cover was washed and dried before placing on the mattress and it washed and dried nicely. The cover provides a good snug fit on the mattress. The cool part is that you cannot detect there is anything under the sheet, it does not cause the body to feel hot while sleeping and a bonus that there is no noise associated with the cover. To date, it has not been put to the test for how it protects from spills or leaks and the hope is that it never will. For now, it is comforting to know the cover is there, ready to protect.
customer_reviews.author: Amateur Tiler

customer_reviews.title: love these things
customer_reviews.text: have them on every bed in the house. washed often for 4 years, still stay on the bed. no noise, no leaks. fit well and don't smell.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel M.

customer_reviews.title: VINYL FREE!  AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: The Luna mattress protector is great because it is vinyl free and you do not feel hot and sweaty when sleeping. I am not sure if it is waterproof yet, because I haven't spilled coffee, water or no one has wet the bed, but again, love the fact that it is a "vinyl free" mattress protector.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Marcoe

customer_reviews.title: Necessary
customer_reviews.text: Pets, kids, drinking any sort of liquid in bed? Then you need this! Need. Plus it keeps your mattress fresh. How many times have I spilled a cup of tea or a glass of water in bed? Senior, elderly pet? Yeah. Need. Won't be without one.
customer_reviews.author: CPatterTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Our puppy sleeps in bed with us sometimes and will occassionally have an accident. So granted, it's a small amount of urine. But it has not gone through to our mattress. It also washes really nice and has not shrink due to being tossed in the dryer. If I ever needed another one, I would definitely return to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: You'll need a fitted sheet
customer_reviews.text: I always use a fitted sheet, but some people don't and like to sleep directly on their mattress protector. If you're one of these people then I don't recommend this one. The material is too rough and scratchy to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: LIES! This product just ruined our organic latex mattress.
customer_reviews.text: A young visitor peed the bed. Since I had a WATERPROOF mattress protector on the fancy organic latex mattress, I wasn't worried about that. Just imagine my delight and surprise when the child woke up soaking wet, with soaking wet bedding—and the supposedly waterproof mattress protector was soaked through as well. The pee was visibly soaked into the mattress. I am really, really angry about this. This manufacturer is just plain lying.
customer_reviews.author: Polly Anna Frish

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, & looks like it will last
customer_reviews.text: This is a true fit - we have a king Temperpedic & I had no problems getting this on there. Our last 2 mattress covers (that were Temperpedic covers & expensive) have fallen apart/material broke after a short period of time. I am hoping this one will last longer - it already looks more "sturdy".
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie

customer_reviews.title: We like it.
customer_reviews.text: I have these covers on all 3 of my kids beds and haven't had any problems. They've been tested against urine and spilt drinks and nothing has gotten through. The only negative would be that the protective layer is only on the top and if an accident happens near the edge your S.O.L. I wish the protective layer went over the edges and down the sides a bit.
customer_reviews.author: L. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one—not those expensive ones!
customer_reviews.text: I have actually ordered 3 of these and two of them were put to the test already when my grandchildren came to visit. There was a virus going around and both children got sick during the night on two separate nights. Nothing soaked through to the mattresses (what a relief!) and both washed in the machine very nicely. This cover is just as good as the ones they sell at the mattress stores that cost $80-$90.
customer_reviews.author: Dkknopf

customer_reviews.title: I am SO glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I've lived for several years with a runny nose every morning. Finally, I decided to see if maybe I had a dustmite allergy and buy this thing. I am SO glad I did, because I have been able to sleep just fine ever since I picked this up. If you always wake up with a stuffy nose and dont know by, try this thing. It does sound different than normal when you lay on it, but I quickly stopped noticing that. It doesn't quite sound like laying on plastic, but its close.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Material on the Sides of the Mattress Cover Are Not Fitted
customer_reviews.text: I like the hypoallergenic aspect of this item, without any vinyl, or vinyl sound. The cover fit a California King in length very well. However, the sides, which accounts for the depth of the mattress was not as fitted as I would have liked. I guess that's to cover all types of CK, including pillow tops. Thankfully, when putting the fitted sheet over it, you don't see those lazy gathers. But, I think the manufacturer did overcompensate on the depth material, because I have a pillow top as well, and didn't need all of the extra fabric. Maybe someone can post a picture in the future. I bought this for someone else who needed the protection.
customer_reviews.author: sk8888

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality, But Funky Odor
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. The odor is another story (I think it came from the packaging). I had to wash it twice with Febreeze In Wash Odor Eliminator added to the wash detergent to get rid of the odor. It fit my king-size Tempurpedic mattress nicely. When I'm in bed, I don't hear any crinkling noises like with vinyl/plastic mattress covers. Aside from a little extra cushion, you can't even tell it's on the bed. It really made my bed feel extra soft.
customer_reviews.author: SAMMY-I-AMMY

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the wifesame new bed, because she has cats, and she loves it. Very satisfied would recommend
customer_reviews.author: wertyuio

customer_reviews.title: Potty training nighttime life changer
customer_reviews.text: These work so well that you can put multiple sets of sheets on and just strip off the first layer (fitted sheet & this) and the next set of sheets is dry & ready to go. This has been amazing while potty training my sons. Once in a while if my son pees multiple times without waking up and I don’t strip the bed in the morning, I have had some minor seep through. But overall I love the leak proof, water resistant quality of this product. I recommend it to all parents and wish I found this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It FITS!
customer_reviews.text: I just put it on the bed today! So far it's great. It's absolutely large enough to fit over my king pillow top mattress with a king feather bed on top! It smelled super strong of chemicals, but I'm sure that's normal. It appears like it will be a good protector of three dogs! If anything changes once I've used it a bit, I will update my review. As you will see in pic #3 it fit over 18+ inches of mattresses w/room!
customer_reviews.author: vino_addict@yahoo.

customer_reviews.title: Great product if you follow the washing instructions
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased at least 6 of these in queen and twin over the past 5 years. They must be dried on low setting as suggested by the manufacturer to retain their waterproof life. Great for the visiting young grandchildren. The cotton terry top, on this Made in USA product, along with a fully all cotton batting mattress pad gives a cool night sleep for adults, as well as a great liquid and stain proof protection for today's expensive mattresses. I am purchasing this one for my daughter and son in law with a newborn baby and all the spills that can occur on a bed with a nursing newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy M

customer_reviews.title: This will greatly reduce your stress
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't matter if it's water or coffee or pee, a mattress protector is a very important investment. I used a full sized one on my old bed and it kept the liquid and any potential odors from getting into my mattress. Since I recent upgraded to a queen sized mattress, New mattress protector was in order. Now I no longer have to worry about my kitten getting all passive aggressive on my ass and pissing on my bed. Any accidents and I take off the sheets and protector and toss it in the wash. Just remember DON'T PUT THIS IN THE DRYER.
customer_reviews.author: BillG

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: The Luna Waterproof mattress pad is exactly what I wanted. I had purchased a similar item that claimed to be vinyl free and it was loud and slipped off the mattress constantly. Then I ordered the Luna because of its excellent reviews. It is perfect! Most days I forget it is on top of the mattress. it is perfectly silent and stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Mary G.

customer_reviews.title: Items I received are not waterproof, disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: The items I received were not waterproof. My young son’s overnight bladder release went right through to his mattress. Very disappointed. These cost almost $70 for two. Hard earned money in our household.
customer_reviews.author: Thriver

customer_reviews.title: Allowed dog pee to seep through to mattress
customer_reviews.text: Did not protect mattress. Our dog peed on our bed and it allowed the pee to seep through to the mattress. Have only owned the protective cover since October 2017, and have air dried the cover when laundered.
customer_reviews.author: chafFAM

customer_reviews.title: Kids? Pets? GET IT!
customer_reviews.text: I sleep with my dogs and bought this cover just in case they get sick in the night and I can't get them off the bed in time. This has happened a few times since I bought it and my mattress is still pure white! It's so reliable and easy to wash that I purchased a second for my guest room's new mattress to keep it fresh and clean. Would definitely recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Didn't buy this for potty training purposes. Just wanted a nice mattress pad. Happened to spill something on my bed when my comforter was down. So of course my blankets and sheets got wet but it protected the mattress extremely well. Also does not make any sound when you sleep on it and it is nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to care for
customer_reviews.text: This mattress protector was all I wanted and more. It is easy to care for. Read the directions, because you should not wash it in hot water or put it in a really hot drier. Just use cold water and the delicate cycle on your drier. This protector is thin, but not in a bad way, in a very very good way. The top is terrycloth and the underside is where the waterproof barrier is, so you never have to worry about your sheets slipping off, because of a smooth surface. I can't imagine anyone being disappointed with this mattress protector. I love it! It is everything they say it is.
customer_reviews.author: Onyx girl

customer_reviews.title: Sleep easy
customer_reviews.text: An excellent choice: fits like a glove on a mattress that requires deep-pocket sheets, doesn't bunch up under the sheets and, because it's light weight, it washes/dries easily. All seams are straight, there's no pilling on the surface and, after months of use, no sign of seams losing threads. The quality design and materials will no doubt keep a mattress clean and dry for years. My take is look no further - buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: AM from WA

customer_reviews.title: Great and comfortable protection for your mattress
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years on each of my beds. I bought this one for a bed I just purchased. These covers help to reduce dust mites, protect your mattress from any fluid spills (to include a bedwetting child), have a soft comfortable surface over the waterproof membrane (so they don't feel hot/sticky like a rubber or vinyl mattress protector does), and fit well. They cost more than the cheaper products out there, but are well worth it. My philosophy is "I bought a $2000 mattress, why not spend $40 protecting it?".
customer_reviews.author: Edward L. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Really nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: We've bought several mattress covers from big box stores, but they all had a vinyl lining that caused us to overheat, sweat, and wake up feeling gross. This has been wonderfully alleviated with the Luna mattress cover. We still are a little warmer than if we didn't have a mattress cover at all, but we don't melt into disgusting puddles anymore! We've only had it on the mattress for about a week, so I'm not sure about the durability through multiple wash cycles, but the price is reasonable enough that it wouldn't hurt if this had to be replaced every year.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Already repelled it’s first stain.
customer_reviews.text: My son spilled red juice directly on the mattress protector. I cringed as I pulled the protector up, but no leak through. Washed it later that day and not even a stain on it. It’s soft and fits our king mattress well with no extra material. It does make a little extra noise when you move around, but not enough to not use it. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: nrum

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I really bought this for the water resistance/occasional accident with my children. So far I have not had to use that part, but will update if I do. I find the sleep quality good as well as the softness. So far, neither kiddo has had complaints on being noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Beth C

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - 2 years later, it doesn't work anymore
customer_reviews.text: Daughter woke up this morning after having wet the bed. I put her in the shower and didn't worry because she had this mattress protector on. I went to clean it up and realized that it hadn't worked. Her mattress was soaked. There is no indication that the cover is worn -- no cracks, no holes, nothing. It just completely failed 2 years after purchase. I bought her a new mattress LAST WEEK and now it has pee stains on it. Don't buy this mattress cover.
customer_reviews.author: Mere

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that I do not like about this is that it is a little noisy getting into bed and/or moving around in the bed. I've had it for about a month now so I don't really notice it so much anymore but the noise is still there. Also the material is almost a towel-like feeling which may not make sense but it will make sense if you purchase this. Cannot say much about cleaning it because I haven't had to clean it more than once or twice since I've had it for a short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Our Needs
customer_reviews.text: I was scared tp get this mattress cover because the last waterproof cover we got was unusable due to it causing us to be too hot to sleep. So I was really worried about whether this would cause problems also. Absolutely no problems after two weeks of sleeping on it. I am so relieved. I would definitely recommend this cover for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Candace S. Huxhold

customer_reviews.title: Really Water Proof
customer_reviews.text: It is not cushy / padded. I have it for the waterproof feature. Most mattress are already very well padded. It washes like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product before for another size bed. It has held up really well. It washes easily, fits the mattress and doesn't cause heat. The only difference in this new one is that the elastic straps that were on the corners are no long there and they made the fit more snug. I will continue to use this brand.
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: Just purchased, but like it so far!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and it is as described. I have a Tempurpedic mattress and it fits with a bit of depth leftover. It doesn't add any extra heat to the bed. I need the waterproof aspect since I've got a foam mattress. I hope not to test that aspect of it. As this is my second waterproof mattress protector, I'm just going to let it air dry instead of dryer. The last one didn't last as the plastic disintegrated into a million tiny flakes after 7 years.
customer_reviews.author: AngelaSRF

customer_reviews.title: Nice waterproof cover
customer_reviews.text: Fits our mattress well. It is a little loose (I think our mattress is only 8 inches deep), but not so loose that it moves around a lot. It does not sleep hot, which was my major concern. We haven’t had any issues drying it; it took about an hour both times on low with dryer balls and checking it about halfway thru to detangle. Overall very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Furball

customer_reviews.title: 2 years now and still working great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a new mattress 2 years ago and remain quite pleased with the product, it is durable, still leak proof, and protects my mattress. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: GinMT

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mattress protector. Its quiet, I don't hear a thing when I move around. It breathes easily so I don't get overheated and sweat. As instructed, I washed it and dried it on low heat after receiving it and there wasn't any issues. In addition, its made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Moroni Tang

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to the excellent reviews. They're true!
customer_reviews.text: I thoroughly read reviews and I chose the Luna Mattress Protector based on the reviews I read. With pets, I was most concerned about effective protection. It has proved effective! Beyond that I didn't want something that would make me hot while sleeping - and I was hoping that it wouldn't have that 'crinkly' sound like many mattress protectors have. Because it's made of soft cotton terry cloth, it sleeps cool and quiet. I very highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: LMsensei

customer_reviews.title: Noise? What noise?
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress protector! I don’t know what people are talking about with the noise. I guess they never used the old style vinyl ones. I used to put a thick mattress cover over the vinyl cover this one replaced. With the Luna I’m down to one less layer to launder which is awesome! I am happy I found this due to its reviews here, I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Cerasuolo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Made in USA. Soft, washed and dried fine, no shrinkage. There is no plastic sound or anything and I can't even tell it's beneath my sheets. Nice!!! Update: it's not completely silent under sheets but still one of the better mattress protectors I've used.
customer_reviews.author: B. Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Does  what it is supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Update: a year later abd multiple washes it's still just as good! Quiet, doesn't make a bunch of noise when my kiddo rolls around. We've used it a few months, and washed multiple times and haven't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff and Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: Ok. It works for now but, odor still transfers through. Very thin for 50 bucks... (more like a sheet than a pad). They could have doubled the thickness for that much $$. It looks like it will tear fairly easy. Also, you have to tumble dry on low heat so, it takes two cycles to dry. You can’t use bleach. Not good if you want to clean cat pee off your mattress sheet. I wouldn’t repurchase. Spend the extra money for a thicker pad.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Fits great because the elasticity is strong all around
customer_reviews.text: Fits great because the elasticity is strong all around. I put it OVER my egg crate instead of directly on top of my mattress to help keep the foam cushioning in place, then I put a comfort-top mattress cover on top of that. So far, everything stays in place without shifting. As far as the waterproofing goes, I'm not sure of it because I haven't tested it. But it's just like the one I previously owned, and that one was reliably waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Pat G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress Cover - Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for 2 different beds in my house. There is no sound, which is incredible. The last waterproof mattress cover I had sounded like a tarp. It works well - unfortunately has been tested a number of times already and withstood many a bout with urine. Highly recommend - a necessity for potty-training.
customer_reviews.author: brookerains

customer_reviews.title: You need this
customer_reviews.text: This mattress protector is AMAZING. After having my baby, my poor bed was constantly inundated with spit up, pee, and other messes. My mattress stayed perfectly clean thanks to this. This protector is also easily thrown into​ the washer AND dryer, making my life simple. And best of all, this protector is like a ninja - it doesn't make your sheets feel weird or sound crinkly. You would never know it is on.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Shifty About This Protector
customer_reviews.text: The part of the mattress pad which is elasticized, holding the protector in place is sturdy and doesn't stretch. This is a major improvement over our last protector. The pad doesn't shift around making uncomfortable ridges and folds in itself and the bottom sheet. The pad looks like terry cloth. It's very comfortable. We haven't washed it yet, but it looks like it will hold up fine as the seams are good. We have slept better since putting this on our mattress! When we go to order another mattress protector it will be this one.
customer_reviews.author: lnwl

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it's supposed to do!!
customer_reviews.text: This works so much better than the protectors thrown in when I bought my mattresses for my 5 year old sons. There has been *zero* leakage the few times one of my sons has peed in his bed, and that's all that counts. I have thrown this in the washer and then in the dryer (light heat, although I accidentally put it on high heat one time, with no bed effects).
customer_reviews.author: Harry Marlin

customer_reviews.title: This is very comfortable to sleep on
customer_reviews.text: This is very comfortable to sleep on. There is a strong smell initially but, after a wash, it fades and I don't notice it at all. There's no more sound than already made by my sheets. Peace of mind well worth the price. I bought for our master bed and guest!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: It's LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: I really can't say a whole lot about this mattress protector besides that it is LOUD. We lay down next to my son and if he falls asleep it's nearly impossible to get out of bed without waking him. We have a two year old Luna cover that isn't nearly as loud so I wonder if they changed the product of if we have a defective one if that's even possible.
customer_reviews.author: Big Bri

customer_reviews.title: Made in America!
customer_reviews.text: I was deciding between this mattess cover and an organic one that was recommend to me by the mattress company. I went with Luna because it's made in the US, verses the organic one was made in china. The luna cover has no chemical smell, and doesn't crackle when sleeping on it. It's completely silent and I never even think about it being on the bed. I only notice it when I change the sheets. I also don't notice a different in my bed temperature with the mattress protector on. I am always happy to support a "made in America" product and would recommend this mattress protector to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nearly 5 years of use and still working well.  Worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mattress protector. It's been on our queen size bed (w/9" thick mattress) now for 4 years, 8 months and still holding up fine--doing it's job. I wash and dry (in drier) monthly; (sheets I do weekly). I will be purchasing some twin size ones for my children's mattresses. Well worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: mk

customer_reviews.title: Great for adjustable bed base!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! No more slipping and sliding of the padded mattress protector I was using. Haven't noticed anything remarkable regarding coolness (I sleep hot). Very thankful that it seems to stay in place as I use my adjustable bed base every single night. The padded Mattress Protectors crumple up under the sheet and are a royal pain. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: nancy j. martin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: After putting this on my bed I was very happy after the first night. It actually helped my sheet stay on the bed and I no longer have the problem where one side pulls off the mattress, not advertised but a very welcome surprise for me. It has already saved my mattress once when a toddler decided to sit in the bed and in lack of other terms, urinate. Stripped the bedding to wash it and not a drop made it to the mattress. I don't feel like it makes my bed any hotter to sleep in or adds any noise when getting in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb Schaffner

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good mattress cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good mattress cover. We bought it to protect an expensive pillow top mattress. We've washed it twice and it dries very quickly. It doesn't make any noise when you move around on it, and it does seem to keep liquids from getting thru to the mattress. Nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing this mattress cover. They work well and are unnoticeable under your sheets. They have saved my mattress countless times from my 2 kids and all the messes that comw with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S

customer_reviews.title: Not So Fitted So Far......
customer_reviews.text: So I just put this on the bed today. First thing that I noticed was the fitted part of the protection sheet is not very snug at all. I had to go around the whole bed to "tuck" it down. I am hoping that it is not so lose that it pulls up and makes the sheets slip. I will update if that happens, it willhave to go back if it does because I am disabled and the specific bed I have is very hard for me to make. So hopfully it stays put lol. Stay tuned......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good quality cover
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good quality mattress protector in the first month of use. I purchased this to protect our new Tempurpedic breeze mattress and my husband noticed that this cover hinders the built-in cooling feature of the mattress. I don't think it traps heat, but it reduces the ability of the mattress to dissipate body heat.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit and Totally Silent
customer_reviews.text: Fits our kingsize mattress perfectly and is totally quiet; we wouldn't even know it was there at night when we're sleeping. It was recommended that it be washed before putting on the bed; we did that and found it took a couple of drying cycles to get completely dry as it suggest low drying heat.
customer_reviews.author: David Bower

customer_reviews.title: We are pleased with the one we purchased
customer_reviews.text: This mattress protector does what the buying blurb says it will do. We are pleased with the one we purchased. The soft terrycloth top helps keep it from being hot (waterproof things usually create heat on top of them due to the waterproof barrier). It washes well and comes out ready to put back on the mattress. If I could change one thing, it would be this: Due to the large corner capacity (20"), use sheet straps to anchor it, especially if your top sheet has a smaller corner capacity (such as 14" or 16"). I recommend this to anyone who wants to protect their mattress from unexpected wetness.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This goes on like a fitted sheet. I was under the impression that it went over the whole mattress and zipped. This is actually a benefit because it allows the protector to be easily removed when it needs to be washed. Washes well in the machine and it fit our mattress well. It doesn't slide around either. I got the matching pillow protectors and am very satisfied with those as well! Hopefully this waterproof protector will keep my husband's sweat from staining the mattress! (Came up with peroxide & baking soda)
customer_reviews.author: Dana Reitz

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother if you are buying this is for a toddler bed.
customer_reviews.text: I love that this mattress cover is soft and quiet, however if you are buying this for a toddler bed don’t bother. This definitely does not stop liquid from penetrating through, especially a toddler who has the occasional bed wetting accident. I even tried the tip to put on two sets of mattress cover and sheet to make changing accidents in the middle of the night easier. Unfortunately the liquid went through not just one mattress protector, but both of them. Time to keep shopping for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hart

customer_reviews.title: Does not completely encase the mattress. Its made like a fitted sheet.
customer_reviews.text: It provides enough protection for me. I actually thought this mattress protector was the type that completely encases the mattress all the way around and that closes with a zipper. Its not. It is made like a fitted sheet, with elastic around the sides. The elastic grips the sides of the mattress. There is an absorbent layer on top of the protector and a waterproofing layer on the underside.
customer_reviews.author: WWII Model Plane Nut

customer_reviews.title: Best Mattress Protector
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this mattress protector. Unlike the previous protector, it is not padded but thin and has some kind of covering that faces the mattress. Since the mattress is already kind of a pillow-top, this mattress protector doesn't bunch up, but remains flat and allows my sheet to remain flat as well. I always thought I needed a padded mattress cover, but when I purchased my Saatva, this was one of the two recommended mattress protectors. I'm glad I purchased both the mattress and this cover.
customer_reviews.author: paula karlberg

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal mattress protector, this is the 3rd one we bought. We have one on our bed and both our boys’ beds. They have had water spilled on them as well as pets and kids having accidents on them, and never has anything gotten through to the mattress. They have all been laundered numerous times and work great, I will always use this brand.
customer_reviews.author: M. Morales

customer_reviews.title: This mattress cover is made in USA
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this product I saw a sticker on the back that said made in China. I had spent considerable time looking for something that was made in USA.so was quite disappointed and wondered whether to believe front which said made in USA or sticker. When I looked more closely I saw that the sticker referred to the bag in which the cover was placed. Sorry manufacturer, next time I will look closely before commenting. At this point I am very pleased with mattress cover. It had an odor which was completely removed with washing. It washed and dried beautifully and is comfortable on my bed.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Besides the fact that it's made in the USA, the mattress pad/protector is wonderful to sleep on. It is NOT hot and has no crinkling sounds when you're repositioning. Those were my two major concerns when I was shopping. My mattress isn't that thick, but I can tell it would accommodate a much deeper mattress. I would recommend this to anyone in the market for one. Total thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: pamedian

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but a little noisy
customer_reviews.text: This cover looks nice and fits very well. It's easy to put on and stays on perfectly. My only complaint is the crinkly noise it makes when you move on it. It's not terrible but it's noticeable. It seemed slightly better after the first wash, so I'm hoping it will improve with time. We use it on a guest bed so it doesn't get much use.
customer_reviews.author: RedRhart

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product and it provides waterproof protection for the mattress. Padding is a thin layer of terry cloth material so if you want more padding there are other options such as Cuddletown’s padded products made in Maine. Beyond the product features, this mattress pad is made in the US and supports jobs for Americans. Most mattress pads are made outside the US and the proceeds are supporting oppressive governments and contribute to climate change from dirty factories.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Loyal user of these mattress covers & highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We had an almost 10-year old cal king mattress that still looked pristine after cosleeping with our baby/toddler for the past 3 years because of the Luna mattress protector. We just upgraded to a new, natural organic euro king mattress which needs breathable protection and so I just bought another Luna mattress protector in the euro king size. All of their mattress covers have really deep pockets, and I realized I can still fit the cal king size on the new mattress as well, so that's nice to be able to keep the old one as a backup. Love that it doesn't have the known nasty chemicals in it and is USA-made as well.
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great protection and priced right.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best mattress protectors I have ever used! I lost my previous ones in a home fire, as well as all of my mattresses. Now I am purchasing these as I order new mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: pmr

customer_reviews.title: Good, one reservation
customer_reviews.text: It is good. Haven't had any spills, so I can't attest to the waterproof nature, but doesn't make noise or cause discomfort. My only qualm is that it has stretched out and it makes the sheets wrinkle up, which I don't like when I'm sleeping. I wish it would stay on more tightly!
customer_reviews.author: Seeking Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress Protector
customer_reviews.text: Great Mattress Protector....Fits well around the mattress. Not very thick therefor you don't even feel it under the sheet. Perfect cotton top does not make the bed warm. Protects well against spills ...I should know I have two under the age of 5 and we have plenty pee accidents and throw ups. Also washes easy and dries fast in the drier. Mine must have been washed 100 times and still are in perfect shape with no tear or break on the plastic side or loss of elasticity on the edges,......would definitely suggest this again other protectors specially the quilted one that make the bed mush warmer and less breathable
customer_reviews.author: PJG

customer_reviews.title: Not leakproof!
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work! It feels great under my sheets but not leak proof. My toddler is potty training and the urine leaks through. This has happened multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Qball

customer_reviews.title: Sensory (SPD) friendly.
customer_reviews.text: My kids seem to like them. They are definitely waterproof. I’m very thankful I put them on their new beds right away. No noise. I noticed you do not feel them thru the sheets like one would other protectors. I didn’t give five stars on all reviews on everything because I personally haven’t slept on them but the kids haven’t complained and they are both on the autism spectrum. If they had problems, I would know.
customer_reviews.author: MC32

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Effective
customer_reviews.text: This is so quiet you don't even know it is under your sheets. It was perfectly shaped to get around all corners of my mattress. Works great and I love that it's made in the USA. 10/10 would recommend. I have spot cleaned and air dried it a few times. Very easy. It has a terrycloth like surface opposite the waterproofing layer.
customer_reviews.author: Anon123

customer_reviews.title: Yes, yes, yes!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love! Is it comfy? No! It's not meant to be! It is absolutely waterproof though. I ordered this because I have an elderly incontinent dog that has accidents in my bed. I had 3, THREE, other "waterproof" mattress pads on my bed and every time she had an accident it went through all three layers and onto my bed. I added this to the top of my layers of pads, and last night she had an accident. I stripped off the pad to find that it only went to that pad and nothing else! Super happy! Ordered a second for when this ones in the wash!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Maness

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet, but I have purchased two others in the past (twin size), and they are amazing! The one thing I really dislike about the mattress protectors I have used in the past, is that they make me sweat. This one doesn't. There's no crinkling of the material either. It keeps fluids away from the mattress, and it's easy to clean. So when we purchased a king size bed, I knew exactly where to go to get a mattress protector.
customer_reviews.author: Arelle

customer_reviews.title: ... protector arrived as expected and seems to be of great quality. I chose to wash it before using ...
customer_reviews.text: This mattress protector arrived as expected and seems to be of great quality. I chose to wash it before using it 1st and followed the directions carefully. I dried it on extra low with a clean towel to help get rid of moisture. It did take forever to dry, but you don't want to rush the process and ruin the waterproofing. The sheet fit my new Bed In as Box Packed perfectly. The terry cloth feature is minimal and could be a little more plush. Although I am happy with this for summer sleeping, I might switch to a different thicker protector for the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Philip.K

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, had it over 7 years!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this cover on my foam mattress for 7 years and have been impressed! Dogs and kids have peed and puked on it from time to time and it always protects the mattress. Has stood up to drink spills too. Definitely was worth the money and ordering a new one today!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: emailed company weeks ago and haven't heard back they missed sewing one corner completely and the first time I had it on it leaked even without me washing it first. it is super loose on my bed but im not blaming the company for that I think we have a weird size cali king.
customer_reviews.author: J

product_meta.title: LUNA Queen Size Premium Hypoallergenic Waterproof Mattress Protector - Made in The USA - Vinyl Free
product_meta.description:
Size:Queen

Luna Premium Hypoallergenic Mattress Protectors (Made in the USA)

Luna protects against allergens, dust mites, bacteria, perspiration, urine and fluids
Using the latest in undetectable sleep technology, Luna offers full protection against dust mites, fluids, urine, perspiration. This makes our protectors especially helpful for anyone looking to protect their mattress while also offering real health benefits. While we sleep, we shed thousands of dead skin cells, which can quickly accumulate providing an ideal environment for dust mites. Luna mattress protectors trap dust mites, allergens and skin cells on the surface of the protector where they can be easily washed away during suggested quarterly launderings. This helps keep your mattress clean while improving air quality where you sleep.

Natural Soft Cotton Terry Surface - Breathable, Cool and Noiseless
To keep our protectors cool and noiseless, the surface material is made with soft cotton terry back coated with a breathable, hypoallergenic and 100% waterproof membrane layer. Cotton terry naturally absorbs moisture and is completely noiseless.

Fitted Sheet Style
To ensure a great fit, an elastic band is used on the side skirt to automatically pull excess material under the mattress.



Can be Machine Laundered
Simply machine-wash with your sheets using normal household detergents that do not contain bleach. Tumble dry on low heat. Do not iron.

Undetectable
Luna mattress protectors won't change the feel of your mattress once applied. This is great for those with any type of mattress including innerspring, memory foam or latex.

All Luna premium protectors are backed by a full replacement 15-year product warranty, contain no phthalates, vinyl or PVCs and are Made in the USA. Queen (60” x 80” fits up to 18’)
feature_bullets: Protects against allergens, dust mites, bacteria, perspiration, urine and fluids (15-Year Warranty)
100% waterproof membrane with fitted sheet style design - Queen Size (60" x 80" fits up to 18" deep)
Luna Airflow Technology allows air to circulate through the protector, but repels liquids
Hypoallergenic cotton terry surface is noiseless, will not change the feel of your mattress and naturally absorbs moisture
Great for asthma, eczema and allergy sufferers (every Luna mattress protector is sourced and made in USA)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars8,786 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
